Text:
(Now, in order to get the "Make Rose Queen" plan
rolling, maybe I should first find the captive Queen Reina.)

(Unlike yesterday, I don't have a maid following me
around today, so I'm free to do whatever.)

(I'm not sure where the queen's bedroom is, so let's
do a little bit of exploring...)
There has been an awful clamour since midday...
Ignore it. See nothing, hear nothing, think nothing.
At this rate, our kingdom won't survive.
(Oh my—)
...My dear, you still can't admit our special love?

Just a bit longer, honey. Once the wedding is over,
we will have no more use for Rose.

You'd rather marry that girl than be with me,
would't you.
The only one in my heart is you, honey.

So once you've finished with her, you'll kill her
and marry me, right?
Of course, honey.

This is too much...it's like a daytime drama rather
than a fantasy world.

I need a different trajectory by about 6pm...gotta
get this train back on the right track.
...Man, what a complicated family.

Knowing Rose, once she knows the truth, she'll be
super pissed and Queen Rose will awaken...yeah...

Rose waits nervously for her red-haired maid to pour
the tea.
Here you are.
Excuse me.
Ah...Margaret.
Yes?
Um, nothing...um.
If that is all, then please excuse me.
Ah...

With the nervous Rose looking on, Margaret turns
around and leaves the room.

Rose and Margaret had grown up together. Rose had
always loved Margaret's beautiful, natural smile.
*sigh*...
She never smiles at me anymore.

But still...at least for my father...at least just
my mother...!
Alone in her room, she feels a cold breeze.
The window should be shut...
Maybe...maybe he has come again?

Rose's heart is pounding. They were to never meet
again, but her heart is full of hope.
Cid...?
In that moment she feels someone behind her.
*gasp*!
Sha—!?
M-Master...Shad...ow!
Have you come to...kill me?
I...I repaid your kindness with evil...
I am so sorry.
Come.
Let me show you the truth.
The truth...
This is...
The bedroom of her mother, Queen Reina.
The truth lies beyond.
The truth...?

She doesn't understand what he means. Apprehension
and anticipation well up inside her as she peers
into the room.
Wha...
Swee...tie...
Sweetie, soon this kingdom will be ours...!
Honey! It is all thanks to you...!

All that work I put into drugging my idiot husband
is finally going to pay off!
He made a very good puppet...

It's a shame he was killed. We had so many plans
for him...
I told you we should've killed Rose from the start!
Think of all the extra work we had to do.
Ahhh, Perv... Pervy darling...
*sob*
Waahhh...
This is the truth.
It can't be! My mother...!
Nghh...!
Ahh...ahh...
Accept the truth...

The time has arrived... What did you see with your
own eyes?
What will you take in your hand...?
Come, your Highness.
The sword of rebellion must be—
Huh...?
Um...she fainted?

The traitor is right there, though! This is your
chance to kill her! I'll even help...
...Anyway, fine.
Sorry, I guess..

Cid picks up Rose, throws her over his shoulders and
jumps from the balcony.
